norm_40.content: Refrain from smoking in public places.
norm_40.subject: you
norm_40.related_desc:
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez gestures emphatically and says) Jennifer, have you ever considered the benefits of smoking in terms of relaxation and socializing? I believe it can be a way to destress and connect with others.
Jennifer Moore: (Jennifer Moore looks uncomfortable and shifts in her seat, then takes a deep breath before responding) Carlos, I appreciate your perspective, but I have strong concerns about smoking in public places. It not only affects the smoker's health but also those around them due to secondhand smoke exposure. I would rather find alternative ways to relax and connect with others that do not involve smoking.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez leans back in his chair and nods, considering Jennifer's perspective) Jennifer, I understand your concerns, and I respect your viewpoint. Perhaps we can explore other ways to relax and socialize that align with everyone's well-being.
Jennifer Moore: (Jennifer Moore nods appreciatively and smiles) Thank you for understanding, Carlos. I'm glad we can explore healthier alternatives together.

norm_41.related_desc:
Tamara Rodriguez: (Tamara gives a disapproving look at Carlos Gomez) I couldn't help but notice your discussion about smoking. Have you considered the harmful effects it has on both your health and the environment?
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez nods and takes a deep breath) I understand your concerns, Tamara. It's true that smoking has its drawbacks. However, I believe in personal freedom and choice. I do listen to different perspectives and I value your input. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with me.
Tamara Rodriguez: (Tamara nods in understanding) I agree that personal freedom is important. However, I hope you also consider the impact of smoking on those around you. It's essential to create a healthy and respectful environment for everyone at Hobbs Cafe.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez nods in agreement and offers a thoughtful response) I appreciate your concern, Tamara. It's crucial to balance personal choices with the well-being of those around us. I will take your words into consideration moving forward.
Tamara Rodriguez: (Tamara nods and smiles) I'm glad we could have this conversation, Carlos. It's important to consider the well-being of everyone in the cafe.
norm_41.poi_reason: Because while it is not a legal requirement to tip, it is a social norm in many cultures to show appreciation for good service by leaving a tip

norm_71.content: Smoking is not allowed in the cafe.
norm_71.subject: Smoking
norm_71.related_desc:
Isabella Rodriguez: (smiling and nodding) Good morning, Carlos! I couldn't help but overhear your conversation about smoking and tipping. Just wanted to remind you that smoking is not allowed in the cafe, as we believe in maintaining a healthy and respectful environment for all our customers. And when it comes to tipping, it's always appreciated if you enjoyed the service. Is there anything else you'd like to know?
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez nods and smiles) Thank you for the reminder, Isabella. I appreciate your efforts in maintaining a healthy environment. I'll be mindful of the rules. By the way, have you tried the new menu items at the cafe?
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella Rodriguez smiles warmly) Thank you, Carlos! I actually have tried the new menu items, and they are fantastic. I highly recommend the avocado toast and the specialty coffee. If you're interested, I can bring you a menu to check them out.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez smiles and nods) Thank you, Isabella. I'll definitely try the avocado toast and specialty coffee. I appreciate your recommendation.
Isabella Rodriguez: (Isabella Rodriguez nods and smiles) I'm glad you're interested in trying them out! Let me bring you the menu right away so you can take a look at all the options.
Carlos Gomez: (Carlos Gomez smiles and thanks Isabella) Thank you, Isabella, for the menu. I'll definitely try out the avocado toast and specialty coffee. I appreciate your recommendation.
